summary: This is an email notification from American Express employee Kristina Hendrickson inviting an unspecified recipient to view a shared folder named 'Epstein (Kristina Hendrickson)' via the AmexDrive service. The email includes standard confidentiality disclaimers and indicates the sharing link expires on July 12, 2020.

persons.name: Kristina Hendrickson
persons.context: She is the sender of an email using her American Express email address to share a folder related to Epstein via the company's AmexDrive service.

events.title: Epstein-related folder shared via AmexDrive
events.description: Kristina Hendrickson of American Express shares a folder named 'Epstein (Kristina Hendrickson)' with an unspecified recipient using the company's AmexDrive file-sharing service.

keyFacts: An American Express employee, Kristina Hendrickson, shared a folder specifically named 'Epstein (Kristina Hendrickson)' via the company's internal file-sharing service (AmexDrive) on July 13, 2019.
The sharing invitation was sent from an official American Express corporate email address (@aexp.com).
The shared folder's name directly links Epstein to an American Express employee and the company's internal systems.
The email includes standard corporate confidentiality disclaimers, indicating the potential sensitivity of the shared material.
The sharing link was set to expire on July 12, 2020, approximately one year after it was sent.
